title: Albright On The U.N.: 'If It Didn't Exist, We Would Invent It'
teaser: The United Nations will be 70 years old next year. NPR's Rachel Martin talks to former U.S. Secretary of State Madeleine Albright about the difficult challenges the organization faces.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
